mapper.select:
WITH pi AS( SELECT p.pidx, p.pname, i.main FROM bg_product p INNER JOIN bg_image i ON p.pidx=i.pidx ), opOodR AS( SELECT op.pidx, op.oidx, op.oname, o.midx, o.rdate, od.quantity, r.ridx, r.contents, r.image1, r.image2, r.grade FROM bg_order_detail od
RIGHT OUTER JOIN bg_option op ON od.oidx=op.oidx
RIGHT OUTER JOIN bg_order o ON od.order_idx=o.order_idx
INNER JOIN bg_review r ON od.detail_idx=r.detail_idx ) SELECT opOodR.ridx, pi.main, pi.pname, opOodR.oname, opOodR.quantity, opOodR.contents, opOodR.image1, opOodR.image2, opOodR.grade, opOodR.rdate FROM pi LEFT OUTER JOIN opOodR ON pi.pidx=opOodR.pidx WHERE opOodR.midx=#{midx}
AND opOodR.rdate >= to_char(sysdate) AND opOodR.rdate >= to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1)) AND opOodR.rdate >= to_char(add_months(sysdate,-3)) AND opOodR.rdate >= to_char(add_months(sysdate,-6)) AND opOodR.rdate >= to_char(sysdate-365) AND opOodR.rdate >= to_char(sysdate-(365*3)) AND opOodR.rdate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{rdate1},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{rdate2},'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY opOodR.ridx DESC
